patch 8.1.0117: URL in install program still points to SourceForge

Problem:    URL in install program still points to SourceForge.
Solution:   Change it to <http://www.vim.org|www.vim.org>. (closes #3100)

patch 8.1.0117: URL in install program still points to SourceForge

Problem:    URL in install program still points to SourceForge.
Solution:   Change it to <http://www.vim.org|www.vim.org>. (closes #3100)
